ing: 2 fluid ounces fresh pineapple-infused gold Barbados rum
des: "Refreshing tiki flavors mingle in this delicious reinterpretation of the classic daiquiri."
ins: Combine Barbados rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and ice in a cocktail shaker. Cover and shake until the outside of shaker has frosted. Strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with lime and fresh mint.
